Articles.Content: I have noticed that many avatars have plain white backgrounds, which don't blend in well with the color in which they are set. If you want a smooth background on the forums, your background needs to be: R(242) G(246) B(248).

And If you want an .gif avatar, you can use this convenient site to resize the gif you want and use the optimize tool to get it below the filesize requirement. It must be no more than 19.5 kb and 64x64 pixels.
.png or .gif with a transparent background works as well. It's what I do if I don't know what the background color will be when I want to match it.
